description: Gold Standard Training Data - 700+ Premium Cards

cards.text: Who would eat mayo straight from the jar at 3am?

Would you rather eat a live spider OR lick a subway pole?
Would you rather fight one horse-sized duck OR 100 duck-sized horses?
Would you rather have permanent hiccups OR always smell like garlic?
Would you rather drunk text your boss OR your ex?
Would you rather accidentally send a nude to your family group chat OR your work Slack?
Would you rather be known as 'the person who cries at work' OR 'the person who never washes their hands'?
Would you rather steal from a charity OR lie under oath?
Would you rather cheat to win $1 million OR play fair and lose?
Would you rather fight a bear with a spoon OR seduce a bear with poetry?
Would you rather have fingers for toes OR toes for fingers?
Would you rather speak only in rhymes OR sing everything you say?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late OR always be 20 minutes early?
Would you rather have to announce every time you fart OR have to ask permission every time you want to speak?
Would you rather never be able to use your phone again OR never be able to eat your favorite food again?
Would you rather be able to read minds but never turn it off OR have everyone able to read your mind?
Would you rather live without music OR live without movies?
Would you rather have a rewind button for your life OR a pause button?
Would you rather always have to say what you're thinking OR never be able to speak again?
Would you rather fight Mike Tyson once OR talk like Mike Tyson forever?
Would you rather eat a bowl of toenail clippings OR drink a cup of armpit sweat?
Would you rather have explosive diarrhea on a first date OR throw up on your crush?
Would you rather walk in on your parents OR have your parents walk in on you?
Would you rather have your browser history made public OR your text messages?
Would you rather shit your pants in public OR piss yourself during a job interview?
Would you rather have to fight your dad OR kiss your mom on the lips for 10 seconds?
Would you rather eat ass OR have your ass eaten by someone you find repulsive?
Would you rather get caught masturbating by your boss OR by your grandma?
Would you rather have a threesome with your partner's parents OR with your own?
Would you rather never orgasm again OR only orgasm in public places?
Would you rather eat a used tampon OR drink a cup of period blood?
Would you rather have your nudes leaked OR have everyone think you're a virgin?
Would you rather be the worst player on a winning team OR the best player on a losing team?
Would you rather give up alcohol forever OR give up sex forever?
Would you rather be famous but broke OR rich but unknown?
Would you rather have no teeth OR no hair?
Would you rather eat only pizza for a year OR never eat pizza again?
Would you rather have a photographic memory OR an IQ of 200?
Would you rather be able to fly OR be invisible?
Would you rather time travel to the past OR the future?
Would you rather be stuck on a desert island alone OR with someone you hate?
Would you rather have unlimited money OR unlimited time?
Would you rather know when you're going to die OR how you're going to die?
Would you rather lose all your memories OR never be able to make new ones?
Would you rather be feared OR loved?
Would you rather have a horrible job with great pay OR a great job with horrible pay?
Would you rather be the funniest person in the room OR the smartest?
Would you rather have a perfect body OR a perfect face?
Would you rather be able to speak every language OR play every instrument?
Would you rather have free WiFi everywhere OR free coffee everywhere?
Would you rather be a genius everyone thinks is dumb OR dumb but everyone thinks you're a genius?

I knew the relationship was over when they _____, and I realized _____.

My toxic trait is _____, and my friends say I need to _____.

cards.red_flag: They don't believe in washing hands
They think the Earth is flat
They collect human teeth
They talk to their plants like children
They only eat chicken nuggets
They sleep in a race car bed

cards.perk: They're a doctor who will take care of you forever
cards.red_flag: They're in a cult

cards.perk: They'll pay off all your debt
cards.red_flag: They want you to quit your job and be a stay-at-home partner
They have 47 cats
They also think vaccines cause autism
They film pranks on homeless people
They judge everyone who isn't
Their family hates you and will never accept you

cards.perk: They want to get married immediately
cards.red_flag: They also want 10 kids
They expect you to do the same for them
They insist on role-playing as historical figures
They want to film everything
They only want to have sex in public places

cards.perk: They're a chef who will cook for you every day
cards.red_flag: They only make food from the medieval era
They want you to join their pyramid scheme
They spend all their money on Funko Pops
They're also a flat-earther
They only write songs about their ex
They made their money selling essential oils
They write you poetry every single day
They've been arrested in 12 countries
They only paint portraits of you while you sleep
They've hacked into your accounts to 'protect you'
They rage quit and break controllers regularly
They insist you do couples yoga every morning at 5am
They argue with you about everything using legal jargon
They love animals more than humans
They document every moment of your relationship
They're writing a book about your relationship without telling you
They smell like fish constantly
They choreograph every aspect of your life
They're a wine snob who judges your Two Buck Chuck
They count your calories and judge your food choices
They're never home and expect you to fund their trips
They use your relationship as material
They cuddle other people for money
They've never worked a day in their life and don't plan to
They're constantly trying to set up your friends
They refuse to acknowledge negative emotions
They do character voices during sex
They genuinely believe Bigfoot is real and won't shut up about it
They never reveal their secrets, even about important things
They want to stuff your pets when they die
They're in full makeup and costume 24/7
They think your relationship is a government psyop

Ex: Can we talk? I miss you.
Partner: Who is Alex and why are they texting you at 2am?
